author: newsr.in
title: Adele Announces New Album
text:
Adele recently shared a note about her new album—calling it a "make-up record" and saying it took a while because, "you know, life happened." At last, she's made the announcement—25 is out November 20. She made the announcement via Instagram with the above image, which may be the album cover. *Update (10/22 11:09 a.m.): *Check out the tracklist below. The record's first single, "Hello", will be released with a Xavier Dolan-directed video tomorrow.
According to previous reports, the new record features collaborations with Tobias Jesso Jr, Max Martin, Danger Mouse, Ryan Tedder, and potentially Damon Albarn.
25:
01 Hello
02 Send My Love (To Your New Lover)
03 I Miss You
04 When We Were Young
05 Remedy
06 Water Under The Bridge
07 River Lea
08 Love In The Dark
09 Million Years Ago
10 All I Ask
11 Sweetest Devotion »
